Author: ciruelax
Text: I’m also here since I just let myself go because I tell myself I’ll fast anyways but I end up not doing that. Maybe it would be better to set a more realistic mindset to start slowly to finally stop binging rather than trying to bounce back by fasting but actually not doing it at all? Ahh it sucks and trust me, I totally understand what you mean but I really hope we get through this soon:/ If you ever feel like talking to someone please DM me

Author: comfortbun
Text: same here man. it’s not even hunger at this point it’s an addiction. i finally understand that now.  in the past i broke cycles with huge fasts but that is what triggered the cycle i am in now. i fasted for three days and suddenly im logging a 4000 calorie intake into mfp at 11pm. i know my body image will suffer. it’ll take weeks to get back on track and i am considering suicide. i wish i knew how to help the both of us.
